description: Real-time vehicle position data from GTFS-RT feeds

name: record_id
description: Unique identifier for this vehicle position record

name: entity_id
description: GTFS-RT entity identifier for this vehicle

name: timestamp
description: Timestamp when this position was recorded

name: timestamp_s
description: Unix timestamp in seconds

name: vehicle_id
description: Unique identifier for the vehicle

name: vehicle_label
description: User-visible label for the vehicle

name: vehicle_license_plate
description: License plate number of the vehicle

name: latitude
description: Latitude coordinate in decimal degrees

name: longitude
description: Longitude coordinate in decimal degrees

name: bearing
description: Bearing/direction of travel in degrees

name: speed
description: Speed of the vehicle in m/s

name: odometer
description: Odometer reading of the vehicle

name: occupancy_status
description: Current occupancy status of the vehicle

name: route_id
description: Route identifier this vehicle is serving

name: trip_id
description: Trip identifier this vehicle is serving

name: start_date
description: Start date of the trip in YYYYMMDD format

name: start_time
description: Scheduled start time of the trip

name: schedule_relationship
description: Relationship to the scheduled trip

name: created_at
description: Auto-appended warehouse timestamp

name: updated_at
description: Auto-appended warehouse timestamp
